info.description: APIs to create and manage Request to Pay payments in order to create, view, update, block and decline the payment requests from both Biller and Payer systems
info.title: Request to Pay Payment services

post.summary: Payment request initiation for EBA Scheme
post.description: Create payment requests for EBA scheme from Biller application

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.summary: Payment request initiation for UK Scheme
post.description: Create payment requests for UK scheme from Biller application

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.description: Enables the Payer to accept Biller's request but pays only a part of the outstanding amount. The original request sent by the biller remains open until the total amount is paid by the payer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Request the biller for an extension of the payment due date
put.description: Enables the payer to request the biller for a new due date in the future for the biller's payment request

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Decline the payment request from biller
put.description: Enables the payer to decline the biller's payment request when payer does not want make any payment towards that request

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Update the messages sent to biller by payer
put.description: Enables the payer to send messages to biller when the payer requires further information regarding a specific payment request

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Update the requested amount in a payment request
put.description: Enables the payer to modify the amount requested by biller, if modification is allowed by the respective scheme

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Update the payment with full amount requested by the biller
put.description: Enables the payer to accept the biller's request and pay the outstanding amount

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the blocked biller details from payer system
get.description: Retrieves the biller details who have been blocked by the payer

parameters.name: participantId
parameters.description: Process Workflow Participant ID

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Decline the payment request and block the biller
put.description: Enables the payer to decline the biller's payment request and block the biller when payer does not want make any payment towards that biller

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.description: Enables the payer to unblock the previously blocked biller

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Update the messages sent to payer by biller
put.description: Enables the biller to send messages to payer when the biller requires further information regarding a specific payment request

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.summary: Payment request initiation for UK scheme from biller to payer system
post.description: Creates payment request for UK scheme. This API can be linked to any published API which is in accordance to requesttopay.co.uk standards

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Manages payment requests for UK scheme between biller and payer systems
put.description: Update payment request onto the biller system from payer to support partial payment, full payment, due date extension request , decline and block the biller, decline the payment request and messages sent to the biller. Similarly, update payment request onto the payer system from biller to support approval of due date extension, rejection of due date extension, messages sent to the payer and acknowledgement to payer.This API can be linked to any published API which is in accordance to requesttopay.co.uk standards.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the payment requests for which extension have been granted
get.description: Retrieves the payers payments requests for which the due date extensions have been granted by the biller

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Approve the due date extension requested by the payer
put.description: Enables the Biller to approve the new due date for the payment, requested by the payer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves  the incoming payment requests for which the extension have been declined
get.description: Retrieves the incoming payments requests for which extensions have been declined by the biller

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Decline the due date extension requested by payer
put.description: Enables the biller to decline the due date extension for the payment requested by the payer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of biller payment requests
get.description: Retrieves the list of biller payment requests which are in Completed, Rejected and Pending status

parameters.name: customerID
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of payment requests that are pending with payer
get.description: Retrieves the list of payer payment requests which are in pending status and requires action from payer

parameters.name: customerID
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of completed payer payment requests
get.description: Retrieves the list of payer payment requests which are in Completed status

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.description: Retrieves the list of payer payment requests which are in Completed, Partially paid, Extension Granted, Declined, Extension Declined and Asked For Extension status

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the billers payment requests which are awaiting due date extension approval
get.description: Retrieves the  payment requests with biller which are awaiting response for due date extension. These requests can either be declined or approved by the biller

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieve the payment requests which are in error status
get.description: Retrieves the payment requests which are in error status due to technical reasons such as payment processing failures.

parameters.name: customerID
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the billers payment requests which are pending to be acknowledged
get.description: Retrieves the payment requests which are yet to be acknowledged by the biller. Generally, Partially paid or Paid are the two statuses with which the biller acknowledges the payer

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeAccountCurrencyAmount.description: Holds the charge to be applied for the corresponding charge type for the order in the currency of the charge account

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

currency.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

remittanceInformation.description: Indicates the remittance information that is supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

options.description: The usable options for the override

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeAccountCurrencyAmount.description: Holds the charge to be applied for the corresponding charge type for the order in the currency of the charge account

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

currency.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

dueDate.description: Identifies the date on which the activity is due.

remittanceInformation.description: Indicates the remittance information that is supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)
